v-model.description: Selected date（ISO 8601 format, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM）
v-model.description_zh: 所选日期（ISO 8601 格式、YYYY-MM-DD 或 YYYY-MM）

type.description: Picker type, optional values date month year
type.description_zh: 选取器类型，可选值 日期 月 年

allowed-dates.description: Restricts which dates can be selected

title-color.description: Color of picker title. If not specified it will use color prop or the default picker color.
title-color.description_zh: 选取器标题的颜色。如果未指定，它将使用颜色道具或默认选取器颜色。

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false 和 0-24 级别

first-day-of-week.description: Sets the first day of the week, starting with 0 for Sunday.
first-day-of-week.description_zh: 设置一周的第一天，从 0 开始表示星期日。

min.description_zh: 允许的最小日期/月份（ISO 8601 格式）

max.description_zh: 允许的最大日期/月份（ISO 8601 格式）

show-current.description: Whether to display the current date

multiple.description: Allow the selection of multiple dates

range.description: Allow the selection of date range

touchable.description_zh: 允许通过触摸切换面板

events.name: preview
events.params: year: number month: number day?: number

slots.name: year
slots.description: Custom the year in the title

slots.name: month
slots.description: Custom the month in the title

slots.name: date
slots.description: Custom the date in the title

slots.name: range
slots.description: Custom the range in the title

slots.name: multiple
slots.description: Custom the multiple in the title

slots.name: actions
slots.description: Custom the views in the action panel
slots.description_zh: 自定义操作面板中的视图
